description.en: On WiseAvax you will be able to stake LP tokens in our yield optimized farm pools to collected earnings in WISE token(s). Our multipliers are set up in a manner such that providing liquidity is highly incentivized and will most likely result in a positive ROI. WiseAvax community members can also stake farm tokens, well-established blue-chip cryptocurrencies, and/or stable coins in our yield optimized single-stake pools. Single-staking pools are a popular & relatively safe way to invest in the Defi as this method does not expose investors to the risks involving impermanent loss.
